Articles.Content:
Now there are challenges for the the main bridge at the R&D facility but what about the tunnel? Here is the challenge:

Make a craft that can make it through the tunnel.

Rules: No changing game files (no changing the gravity ex.)

May be manned or unmanned

Please say if stock or modded parts, will be judged the same but on different leader boards.

+1 point for a rover with powered wheels

+1 point if kerbal walks through it

+3 points for a rover combining powered and unpowered wheels

+5 points for using the unpowered landing gear alone

+15 points for flying though it

+1 point if kerbal survives the experience

+1 point for every kerbal on board

+1 point for every wheel over or under 4

+3 points if flying craft survives and lands

+5 points if done without wings if it is a flying machine

+1 point if done with rockets

+ #m/s craft had in the tunnel (decimal point rounded down)

If you make a craft that does something not described here, post if you wish and I will figure out how many points will be awarded.

Stock

1. Aphobius: 271

2.

3.

4

5.

Modded

1.

2.

3.

4.

5.

Note you can improve your score. Pictures or videos work

Edited October 22, 2013 by Cols
243 + 15 + 4 + 3 + 5 + 1

Entry

Did it a few days ago, I can easily land it, but score it as you want. I might make another one especially for this challenge.

That was awesome! If you can show it landing I will change the score

Edited October 22, 2013 by Cols
Thank you. I'm kinda bored anyway right now, I'll make another one especially for this challenge. I stream it on twitch if anyone wanna see it. (my name is Aphobius there too)

God of Kerbal

After all I've used my old trusty rocket.

There's an even narrower passage between the wind tunnel and the building next to it. Try flying through that one.

Another tricky trip would be buzzing the front of the astronaut building. Fly as close as possible, fast as possible, along the concave curved front.
